PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_SpaceProgramCommon
PropertySetDef.Definition: Definition from IAI: Properties common to the definition of all instances of IfcSpaceProgram

PropertyDef.Name: Location
PropertyDef.Definition: General description of the required location for the space (e.g. "third floor south")

PropertyDef.Name: FunctionRequirement
PropertyDef.Definition: General description of the functional requirement for the space (in addition to the space name)

PropertyDef.Name: SecurityRequirement
PropertyDef.Definition: General description of the security requirement for the space (in addition to the function requirement)

PropertyDef.Name: PrivacyRequirement
PropertyDef.Definition: General description of the privacy requirement for the space (in addition to the security requirement)

PropertyDef.Name: LightingRequirement
PropertyDef.Definition: General description of the lighting requirement for the space (e.g. "natural lighting required")

PropertyDef.Name: FFETypeRequirement
PropertyDef.Definition: General description of the Furniture, Fixtures and Equipment requirement for this space.

PropertyDef.Name: EmployeeType
PropertyDef.Definition: General description of the employee type that will occupy the space (e.g. manager, programmer, secretary, etc.). The type classification depends on the company based terms for employee types.

PropertyDef.Name: OccupancyType
PropertyDef.Definition: Occupancy type for this object. It is defined according to the presiding national building code.

PropertyDef.Name: OccupancyNumber
PropertyDef.Definition: Maximum number of occupants for the designed usage of the space.
